customer_name: Tiger Encounter And Rehabilitation Sanctuary Corp
site_name: TIGER ENCOUNTER AND REHABILITATION SANCTUARY CORP

citations.narrative:
The wooden blocks that are on either side of the bolts for the tiger cage to the north containing "Ralph" are rotting
and need to be replaced. The outdoor housing facilities shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good
repair to protect the animals from injury and to contain the animals.
Correct by: 06-26-17.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Manager.

narrative:
3.125(a)
FACILITIES, GENERAL.   
The wooden blocks that are on either side of the bolts for the tiger cage to the north containing "Ralph" are rotting
and need to be replaced.  The outdoor housing facilities shall be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good
repair to protect the animals from injury and to contain the animals.
Correct by:  06-26-17.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Manager.
